snippet.title: Alluvium Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for our Adventure Jam 2018 game Alluvium.
Get it free from http://powerhoof.itch.io/alluvium

Alluvium is a a pulp adventure thriller that'll have you on the edge of your seat till the final click!

After his plane crashes on a remote stretch of Papuan coast, civil engineer Ian Forester is left stranded, hungry, and alone. He must survive the untamed wilderness, wait for rescue... and pray his dark secret doesn't catch up to him.

Made in two weeks for #AdvJam2018
